segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like his life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far that the stool is wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s risking so much just for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is waiting with such excitement, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught before doing something like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just adding to the chaos of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over—it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their determination, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they get away with it without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
